title: Which champion abilities would you want IRL?
body:
We can’t all be champions on the Rift but if we were, it’d make life way more interesting-- or at least make snacking easier. We asked the community how they’d use champion abilities in everyday life and some of y’all seem pretty hungry! Check out some of the responses below and tell us which champion abilities you’d want in real life.
